title: Provided further that where reservations for public amenities are proposed on plots already designated (with developed amenity, but with potential of the land not fully utilized), then in such cases, the areas of reservation/s will be as decided by the Municipal Commissioner, if not defined by DP
clause_text: Provided further that where reservations for public amenities are proposed on plots already designated (with developed amenity, but with potential of the land not fully utilized), then in such cases, the areas of reservation/s will be as decided by the Municipal Commissioner, if not defined by DP.
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:
